title: Budget Fiscal Year Add Schema
description: Schema for creating or updating a budget fiscal year

companyUuid.description: The UUID of the company to which the event belongs

entityId.description: The unique identifier of the entity associated with the fiscal year

reason.description: The reason for adding or updating the fiscal year

syncTime.description: The time when the fiscal year was synchronized

fiscalYearSyncGuid.description: The unique Sync GUID of the fiscal year being added or updated

startDate.description: The start date of the fiscal year being added or updated

endDate.description: The end date of the fiscal year being added or updated

name.description: The name of the fiscal year being added or updated

fiscalYearStatus.description: The status of the fiscal year being added or updated

creationDate.description: The creation date of the fiscal year being added or updated

lastModifiedDate.description: The last modified date of the fiscal year being added or updated

createdBy.description: The user who created the fiscal year being added or updated

modifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the fiscal year being added or updated
